desc: Decorate your Home with the Leading Home Furniture Retailer in UK for Dressing, Living, Bedroom & Dining Room Furniture. Order Now on Phone/Online. Enjoy Free Delivery & 100% Money Back Guarantee with Easy Returns with Vanity Living in UK

layout.text: A classic retro styled black and mirror side table features black painted legs, a fully mirrored tabletop and a drawer with a sophisticated crystal handle.
